headline: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. Announces Pricing of Tender Offers
summary: HOUSTON, October 02, 2025--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint Energy" announced today the applicable reference yield (the "Reference Yield") for the Securities (as defined below) and the applicable total consideration (the "Total Consideration") to be paid in connection with the previously announced cash tender offers (each, a "Tender Offer" and collectively, the "Tender Offers") for (i) up to $300,000,000 aggregate purchase price (excluding Accrued Interest (as defined below))

headline: Does CenterPoint Energy’s US$65B Infrastructure Plan Transform the Long-Term Growth Outlook for CNP?
summary: CenterPoint Energy recently announced a transformative capital plan, committing US$65 billion over 10 years from 2026 to 2035 to expand and modernize its electric and gas infrastructure, mainly to meet growing power demand in Texas and across its multi-state operations. The company also raised its full-year 2025 non-GAAP EPS guidance and introduced 2026 projections, signaling strong confidence in its capacity to deliver long-term growth and address emerging needs from data centers and...

headline: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. Announces Early Results of Tender Offers
